events.name: Europe 2012 Buspreneur Competition Finals @ Microsoft
events.about:
Come watch Europes top entrepreneurial talent compete in the European Buspreneur 2012 finals at Microsofts beautiful France campus.  

 StartupBus and FounderBus have partnered to create Europes largest hackathon on wheels to date.  The competition culminates in Paris with nine road-hardened teams presenting their newly launched startup to a panel of esteemed judges who pick one winning team.

Come participate in the event, root for your country, and see some of Europe’s brightest entrepreneurs perform at the StartupBus Europe 2012 finals.
